Title: Heroes (1)
Plot: A film crew arrives to document the work of the S.G.C. for eventual disclosure to the public, but finds that the base's personnel are less than eager to participate.
GuestStars: Ronny Cox, Christopher Redman, Tobias Slezak, David Lewis, Mitchell Kosterman, Ryan W. Smith, Julius Chapple, Christopher Pearce, Adam Baldwin, Saul Rubinek
